paragraphs: Returning to the job market after a career break to re-train as a data analyst, I am now seeking a new opportunity to leverage my analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. I bring years of experience as a quality assurance tester, along with a background in operational roles within the tech and travel industries.

sidebarSections.title: skills
sidebarSections.content:
Communication

liaising with developers, providing customer support, negotiating contracts with suppliers

Attention to detail

detecting defects in software, processing requests accurately

Leadership

training new members of staff, managing small teams

Technical

Excel, SQL, JIRA, Python, Power BI

responsibilities.title: Power BI Development
responsibilities.description: Developed a Power BI report for the Corporate Functions department

responsibilities.title: Game Quality Assurance
responsibilities.description: Ensured the quality and reliability of the Stellaris computer game by reporting defects and providing feedback to game designers and developers on game features and mechanics

responsibilities.title: Agile Testing Implementation
responsibilities.description: Played a vital role in establishing agile testing best-practices in a cross-functional team

responsibilities.title: Operations Coordination
responsibilities.description: Coordinated the day-to-day operations of a small telecoms company

responsibilities.title: Multi-departmental Management
responsibilities.description: Handled various tasks, such as accounting, HR and customer service

responsibilities.title: Business Development
responsibilities.description: Focused on customer retention, supplier relationships and hiring new talent to scale up the business

roles.title: FIT Assistant Manager and Customer Delivery Manager

responsibilities.title: Department Operations
responsibilities.description: Coordinated the operations of the Offline FIT Department

responsibilities.title: Client Portfolio Management
responsibilities.description: Ensured the retention of a portfolio of clients and delivery on financial targets, recruited and mentored new staff, monitored team and individual performance

responsibilities.title: Travel Operations
responsibilities.description: Processed bookings and requests from global travel partners, created travel itineraries, contracted and reserved accommodation and other travel services
